version_description:
Dear Fans! You voted for it, you got it! With this update we introduce in-app purchases that will give you more freedom to enjoy the game.

See you on the leaderboards!

A lot of awesome features!

* new tournament stages,
* improved iCloud management,
* plenty of optimizations and improvements.

Thank you for playing "Sky Force 2014" - we've made it for you! Please do not forget to rate the game every time it get's udpated.

Collect cards to unlock special abilities. Collect them all!

Thank you for playing Sky Force 2014. If you like our game please make sure to rate it. Thank you!

A brand new bonus level. Stay tuned, there is more to come!

Thank you for playing Sky Force 2014. If you like our game, please do rate it every time a new update is available. It keeps us motivated to add new features. Thank you!

- new difficulty mode to push your score even higher (unlocked after you complete stage 8)
- added level 5 upgrade of wing cannons,
- added level 4 upgrade of missiles, laser and megabomb,
- multiple bugfixes and improvements.

Stay tuned, there is more to come!

Thank you for playing Sky Force 2014. If you like our game, please do rate it every time a new update is available. It keeps us motivated to add new features. Thank you!

Attention all pilots!!! The fight is far from over. The enemy forces were detected in a brand new location. We need your help!

Enjoy a brand new, shiny level, uhh-ohh so beautiful! :)

Also, now the game is more compatible with iOS 8.

- improved luck to find a new card,
- introducing Vibra feature,
- improved iCloud save.

Thank you for playing Sky Force 2014. If you like our game please do not forget to rate it.

- added support for Metal Graphics and 64 bit code,
- new sfx indicating that the shield power-up is about to end,
- numerous fixes and improvements.

Thank you for your support and reviews!

Fixed problem with Chinese and Japanese fonts in iOS 9.

If you like Sky Force 2014 please do not forget to rate it. Thank you!

Fixed problem with Chinese and Japanese fonts in iOS 9.

If you like Sky Force 2014 please do not forget to rate it. Thank you!

This update brings numerous tiny improvements that will make the game even better. We hope you will enjoy it even more! ;)

If you like Sky Force 2014, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Improved compatibility with iPhone X.

If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thank you!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Improved compatibility with iPhone X.

If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thank you!
